meanings.definition: A type of flat-woven rug or carpet.
meanings.sent1: I saw beautiful kilims at the market.
meanings.sent2: The kilims in the living room added a touch of color.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the kilims were a perfect place to nap.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like kilims, weaving a story that captivated everyone.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the kilims told stories of ancient traditions.
